The results are reported using a contribution approach. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.

baseline.value: A human rights education manual for primary and secondary schools in Kurdistan-Iraq is lacking

comment.narrative: A human rights education manual for primary and secondary schools in Kurdistan-Iraq is lacking

target.value: A human rights education manual for primary and secondary schools in Kurdistan-Iraq is available

comment.narrative: A human rights education manual for primary and secondary schools in Kurdistan-Iraq is available

actual.value: A human rights education manual for primary and secondary schools in Kurdistan-Iraq is published and used
